stimulusHtml: Let f be a polynomial function with values of f ′ ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B29@ at selected values of x given in the table above. Which of the following must be true for − 2 < x < 6 ? MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C25@
choicesHtml: The graph of f has at least two points of inflection.
f has at least two relative extrema.
